content.text:
# 2009 President's Cup – Singles

Andrey Golubev
| runner   =  Illya Marchenko
| score    = 6–3, 6–3
| edition  =
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Andrey Golubev successfully defended his last year's title. He defeated Illya Marchenko 6–3, 6–3 in the final match.
Seeds
Denis Istomin (second round)
#  Teymuraz Gabashvili (second round)

#  Laurent Recouderc (second round)

#  Mikhail Kukushkin (quarterfinals)
}}
